Package com.csse3200.game.entities.factories

Class EffectFactory

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.entities.factories.EffectFactory
public class EffectFactory extends Object
Factory to create Effect instances based on configuration.

  • Method Details

    • createEffect

      public static Effect createEffect(EffectConfig config, Entity sourceEntity)
      Creates an Effect instance based on the provided configuration and source entity.
      Parameters:
      config - The effect configuration.
      sourceEntity - The entity applying the effect.
      Returns:
      An instance of Effect.

    • createOrUpdateEffectEntity

      public static void createOrUpdateEffectEntity(Entity target, EffectType type, float duration, Runnable disposeCallback)
      Creates an EffectEntity based on the provided configuration and source entity.
      Parameters:
      target - The entity to which the effect is applied.
      type - The type of effect to create.
      duration - Duration of the effect in seconds.
      disposeCallback - Callback to run when the effect entity is disposed.

    • loadAssets

      public static void loadAssets()
      Load assets required for effects.
